title: [威士忌]1960’s Ballantine’s 17 years of age
content:
https://i.imgur.com/EGdAw7s.jpg
This is a 1960’s bottled Ballantine’s matured 17 years of age. Nothing else to describe, just a perfect blend. 
.
Ballantine’s Blended Whisky bottled in early 1960’s
43% abv
.
Color: clear gold
Nosing: hint of honey, balanced maltiness and grain, absolutely spot on 
Palating: delicate,  light and smooth body, cassia, honey, mild sweetness and smoke coming through, harmonic yet well balanced structure
Aftertaste: short, fresh mints, sweetness, elegance 
.
為什麼
一定要
十五個
中文字
啦啦啦
